secret_passphrase.label: Secret passphrase (production account)
secret_passphrase.comment: The same of your HiPay Enterprise production account

secret_passphrase_test.label: Secret passphrase (test account)
secret_passphrase_test.comment: The same of your HiPay Enterprise test account

currency_transaction.label: Use order currency for transaction
currency_transaction.comment: Only if payment method is in "Sale" mode.

secret_passphrase.label: Secret passphrase (production account)
secret_passphrase.comment: The same of your HiPay Enterprise production account

secret_passphrase_test.label: Secret passphrase (test account)
secret_passphrase_test.comment: The same of your HiPay Enterprise test account

moto_send_email.label: Send an email to customer to pay

activate_basket.label: Activate basket
activate_basket.comment: Activate the basket sending to HIPAY

attribute_ean.label: Attribute ean
attribute_ean.comment: If you store support ean, indicate the field name

load_product_ean.label: Load attribute
load_product_ean.comment: If you activate this option, a product loading is carried out to get ean (Please see documentation )

fraud_payment.label: Fraud Payment Review Email
fraud_payment.comment: This email is sended to customer, if his payment is in fraud state

copy_to.label: Send Payment Fraud Email Copy To

copy_method.label: Send Payment Fraud Email Copy Method

fraud_payment_accept.label: Fraud Payment Accept Email
fraud_payment_accept.comment: This email is sended to customer, if his payment is validated by merchant

copy_to.label: Send Payment Accept Email Copy To

copy_method.label: Send Payment Accept Email Copy Method

fraud_payment_deny.label: Fraud Payment Deny Email
fraud_payment_deny.comment: This email is sended to customer, if his payment is denied by merchant

copy_to.label: Send Payment Deny Email Copy To

copy_method.label: Send Payment Deny Email Copy Method

order_status_payment_canceled.label: Order status when payment canceled by customer

success_redirect_page.label: Redirect page success
success_redirect_page.comment: Page to redirect when transaction is successful, leave empty for checkout/onepage/success

failure_redirect_page.label: Redirect page failure
failure_redirect_page.comment: Page to redirect when transaction fails, leave empty for checkout/onepage/failure

pending_redirect_page.label: Redirect page pending status
pending_redirect_page.comment: Page to redirect when transaction is in pending status

cctypes.comment: Sort the list by drag'n/drop credit card type
